title: In Swing State Of Colorado, Voter Says She Has To Settle For Choice Of Evils
teaser: One of the contests that could decide control of the Senate is in Colorado. Steve Inskeep traveled there to knock on voters' doors. In this first part, we meet Ili Bennett, a woman hit hard by the Great Recession and hungry for big changes in the country.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
